title: 6 Days
short_cast: Jamie Bell, Abbie Cornish, Mark Strong, Martin Shaw, Ben Turner, Aymen Hamdouchi, Tim Pigott-Smith, Robert Portal, Colin Garlick, Andrew Grainger, Martin Hancock, Emun Elliott

desc: When armed gunmen seize the Iranian Embassy in 1980, a tense six-day standoff ensues while elite British soldiers prepare for a dangerous raid.
